section.heading: Severability.
section.text: If any provision of this chapter, or any paragraph, section, sentence, clause, phrase or word or the application thereof, in any circumstances is held invalid, the validity of the remainder of this chapter, and of the application of any such provision, paragraph, section, sentence, clause, phrase or word in any circumstances shall not be affected thereby and to this end, the provisions of this chapter are declared severable.

annotations.annotation: Mar. 29, 1977, D.C. Law 1-89, title IV, § 418, 23 DCR 9532b
